title.native: プリティーリズム・レインボーライブ

description:
Naru Ayase is an 8th grader who can see the colors of music when she listens to it. For Naru, who is extremely good at decorating, becoming the owner of a shop like Dear Crown was her dream. One day, she finds out that the manager of a newly-opened shop is recruiting middle school girls who can do Prism Dance, and immediately applies. Naru begins to Prism Dance at the audition, and an aura she's never experienced spreads out in front of her. At that moment, a mysterious girl named Rinne asks her if she can see "rainbow music".

(Source: Anime News Network)

node.description:
[Official Website](https://iris.dive2ent.com/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/iris-official-blog/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/iris_official_) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/iris.dive2.official) | [Ustream](http://www.ustream.tv/user/dive2iRis)

i☆Ris is an idol group formed by Avex in 2012 under the DIVE II Entertainment label. Its members are also seiyuu.

__Members:__
• [Saki Yamakita](https://anilist.co/staff/117183/Saki-Yamakita) (山北早紀) - Color: Green; (leader)
• [Yuu Serizawa](https://anilist.co/staff/116515/Yuu-Serizawa) (芹澤優) -  Color: Blue
• [Himika Akaneya](https://anilist.co/staff/119203/Himika-Akaneya) (茜屋日海夏) - Color: Purple
• [Yuki Wakai](https://anilist.co/staff/122697/Yuki-Wakai) (若井友希) - Color: Red
• [Miyu Kubota](https://anilist.co/staff/119204/Miyu-Kubota) (久保田未夢) - Color: Orange
• [Azuki Shibuya](https://anilist.co/staff/126076/Azuki-Shibuya) (澁谷梓希) - Color: Yellow (announced to graduate on March 31st, 2021.)

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

Prizmmy☆ is a Japanese girl group formed by Avex Entertainment in 2012 that was involved in the promotion of the [Pretty Rhythm](https://anilist.co/anime/10257/Pretty-Rhythm-Aurora-Dream/) anime series. Their activities included doing live-action segments at the end of each episode, recording music videos for ending theme song performances, and holding various concerts and events in Japan. Fictionalized versions of the group members appear as the main characters in [Pretty Rhythm: Dear My Future](https://anilist.co/anime/12863/Pretty-Rhythm-Dear-My-Future/). They continued to perform theme songs for the series' successor, [PriPara](https://anilist.co/anime/20742/PriPara/). Following the end of PriPara, Prizmmy☆ disbanded on March 31, 2017.

The members of Prizmmy☆ are:
- Mia Kusakabe
- Reina Kubo
- Karin Takahashi
- Ayami Sema (until March 30, 2014)
- Hina Miyazaki (since April 5, 2014)

__Doujin Circles:__ UB, Vachicalist

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/okamarble)

A guy who chooses to only play female characters in games. Since he is called Okama (cross-dresser) after all.
